articles.title: M&A to Be 2026 Theme: State Street Investment Management
articles.mainIdea: M&A to Be 2026 Theme: State Street Investment Management
articles.summary: Bloomberg: M&A to Be 2026 Theme: State Street Investment Management. "I do think M&A is back," State Street Investment Management's Altaf Kassam tells Bloomberg Television. "Consolidation, the rewiring of the global trade order, I think that all comes together into spurring M&A to improve efficiency," he adds.
